text: This is a flier for red ryder bbguns.  On it a child is pulling a shining red wagon with a cooked peasant with a wooden rifle over one shoulder.  the child has a dog trailing beside him and a satisfied look on his face.  The caption read "When you chose Red Ryder, you invest in the American Dream.  You invest in our Independence."

This is an old flier for a movie from the 30s.  A tan man with slick black hair and muscles bulging through his offwhite suit is clasping a woman to his hip with one hand, and the woman is wearing a black leather dress.  With her hips splayed, she is holding a pistol in one hand and starring into directly out.   The caption reads "Witness the rebirth of New Noir with 'Jersey Shore Blues'.  Starring Jenifer Languiz as 'Snookie'!"

"Have you found your savior today?  Atom is here for you, it is inside you!"  This flier proves the rising popularity of the Atom Cult, a religion in which the essence of life is discovered through meticulous study and pious donations.
"Joe's Diner, 1/2 pound of meat, 3 toppings, "your choice", all with a side of freedom fries and a gulp size pop."
"WE WERE RIGHT THE GOVERNMENT DID IT"
"I shot the sheriff; but I couldn't find the deputy"
"Some plant vines started chasin after me, so I took a gas mask and some teargas and I ran through them."
"this demon thing came after me  It got me good.  It shot it, but I wont make it"
"When I was a kid I used to slingshot at  bugs and birds.  Its really playing off nowadays, Ill tell you what"
"ALL YOU STONERS WITH YOUR VIDEYA GAMES - I BET YOU WISH YOU TOOK THE TIME TO LEARN A SKILL NOW DONTCHA"
"I tried to be a bard, but the rats didnt like my piping."
"I found a choclate bar on my pillow when I got home last night.  I left and dont wanna go back."
"this demon thing came after me  It got me good.  It shot it, but I wont make it"
"DANNY IF YOU READ THIS THIS IS CLARA WERE ALL OKAY AND WERE HEADING TO THE RIVER A BOAT SAID THEY WERE DOCKED NEARBY."
"When I think of all the dead people I get mad, because I was supposed to be the next big leader.  WHERES MY CHANCE!??"
"You know they got a machine that can change the weather now?  You put in a bunch o'numbers and the whole thing funks around!"
"A man in a black robe came up to me, said he wanted to make a deal..."
"Cha-cha-cha-chia!  Saw a woman today, with fungus coming out her head like hair tendrils."
"gotta slow down, man.  I dont think we spend more than 20% of our time fightin'  Put some marley on and take off that racketus tripcore nonsense man."
"I kept shooting with my handgun, but I never got any better!"
"ITS OKEY GUYS!  I BARRYED A TIME CAPSUL IN MY BACKYARD!  I PUT IN SOME HOEHOES."
"I got my tinfoil hat on.  good thing too, cause this monster was starrin at me kinda funny, trying to freeze my mind in place."
"You want my advice?  Smoke Crack, It gets shit done."
"WASP APPROACHING CONTINUE Y WASP APPROACHING CONTINUE Y WASP APPROACHING CONTINUE Y WASP APPROACHING WASP APPROACHING"
"The raindrops keep falling on my head, the acid ensured my eyes would soon be bleedin red..."
"ALWAYS WITH THE MINMAXXING GUYS  YOURE ALWAYS WORKING TO GO HOME TO PAY RENT TO SLEEP TO WAKE UP TO WORK AGAIN.  STOP"
"IM OFF TO THUNDERDOME, BYE SUCKERS."
"If you get a parasite, take some sand and some vodka.  Rub the sand onto the afflicted area.  Then rinse with vodka."
"I put my toilet water into a gastank.  then I poured it into a glass cup.  Then I drank it without vomiting my insides back into the toilet."
"This isn't real this is a test to turnyou into a Manchurian Canidate!"
"Real Men do it with STYLE.  SUPASTYLIN."
"Theyre all hiding on an oil rig, I heard it myself over the am airwaves.  They think theyre the nobles of the 21st century, the prigs."
